org.jerkar.api.depmanagement
Class JkModuleDependency

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkDependency
      org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkModuleDependency
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class JkModuleDependency
extends JkDependency

A dependency on an external module. External modules are supposed to be located in a repository. The version range identify which versions are likely to be compatible with the project to build.
For example, org.hibernate:hibernate-core:3.0.+ is a legal description for an external module dependency.

See Also:
Serialized Form
